title: Hey this is really important i need help ASAP
body: I just finished an aram game and went to start a new 1 then it said i was already in a game and i need to restart the client so i did and then it came up with game crashed please try to reconnect to game so i tried to reconnect but it wont work THE THING IS THOUGH I'M NOT IN A GAME I NEVER Q'D UP FOR A GAME I NEVER JOINED 1 I JUST FINISHED MY ARAM WHERE THE ENEMY TEAM SURRENDERED AND THIS IS ANNOYING ME ALOT! BECAUSE I WANT TO PLAY CAN YOU PLEASE FIX THIS ASAP ... - Thankyou very much :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Is this still occurring? This is known as a "Ghost Game".

This happens when your client doesn't receive the proper "Game end" message, it should resolve itself after a few hours.
OI RITO PLEASE FIX FFS IM GETTING BORED OF RUNESCAPE
I just had this after I played a ranked game, now I can't play more, is this happening to everyone no matter what gamemode they play?
Yeah I'm not too sure It still hasn't been fixed for me is it the same for you? I want to play with my friends but It's still fked lol
Its still not working, after I played a game on my smurf....... rito pls fix
OI PLEASE SOMEONE HELP ME I NEED TO PLAY LEAGUE OF LEGENDS MY FRIENDS ARE WAITING FOR ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
